name: project-colors
description: Customize your VS Code with project-specific colors and settings.

projectColors.name.description: The name of the current project.

projectColors.mainColor.description: The main color used for project theming.

projectColors.isActivityBarColored.description: Whether the activity bar should be colored with the main color.

projectColors.isTitleBarColored.description: Whether the title bar should be colored with the main color.

projectColors.isStatusBarColored.description: Whether the status bar should be colored with the main color.

projectColors.isProjectNameColored.description: Whether the project name should be colored with the main color.

projectColors.isActiveItemsColored.description: Whether the active items should be colored with the main color.

projectColors.setWindowTitle.description: Whether the window title should be set to the project name.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
